name: Preactor International Ltd
overview:
Preactor International provides production planning and scheduling software used by a wide range of businesses in the manufacturing sector around the world.

Preactor is also designed for integration with other software such as ERP, MES, Data collection, Forecasting, Demand Planning and OEE applications. The benefits of Preactor that can be obtained after installation offer a return in investment measured in months, sometimes weeks.

Proven benefits include: 15-20% Improvement in productivity â€“ get more from what you already have. 40-50% Reduction in raw materials inventory â€“ synchronize purchasing with an achievable schedule. 40-50% Reduction in make-span time â€“ reduce WIP that slows down production flow. 50-90% Improvement in customer service â€“ increase on-time deliveries.

milestones.description: Released Preactor Express, a free production planning and scheduling software.
